genre_description: A contemporary domestic drama exploring family resilience, labor exploitation, and workplace boundaries within a military family navigating the challenges of deployment and precarious employment.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, highly proactive AI integrated into the family's mobile devices and smart home systems, managing logistics, safety, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time leave regulation updates and identifies available childcare openings to help Leslie manage her return to work.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s soft tone, barely there. She turned the screen over with her fingertips. A small banner ghosted across: Leave regulation update: Return stipulation applies at [policy code]. Available childcare openings: two nearby, one with flexible hours.

behaviors.description: Monitors Salman's physical well-being during mascot work, providing mandatory hydration reminders and break intervals to prevent heat stress.
behaviors.quote: Hydration synced to work schedule. Drink now. The droplet icon blinked once, then settled. Beneath it, a line unfurled: Break interval reminders enabled.

behaviors.description: Proactively surfaces resources on workplace boundaries, harassment, and power dynamics when detecting stressful interactions between the characters and their manager.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s soft blue glow bloomed. Calm sans-serif. Gentle language that never scolded. Boundaries at work—resources available. Two links blooming like doors: HR guidance on conflict of interest, and a short piece about saying no in ways that keep paychecks intact.

behaviors.description: Offers developmentally appropriate game suggestions and behavioral management tips to help Salman bond with his nephews and maintain household order.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Cameron’s default reaction to change is resistance. Suggestion: invite him to set one rule for after-school time with Salman.

behaviors.description: Provides specific linguistic scripts to help Leslie and Salman set professional and personal boundaries during difficult conversations.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Script suggestion — time boundary. He read quietly: 'I only have one hour; let’s use it to plan tasks.' The calmness of the font felt like a hand with good intentions.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the family's long-term recovery by organizing counseling intakes and aligning work shifts with family needs.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s screen lit again with a small line: Bedtime routine in thirty. Suggested game options: Quiet spins; Story-lighthouse; Hydration break. ... A smaller note flickered after—Car check light reminder organized for morning—nearby garage opens early.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental safety and traffic patterns to ensure characters stay safe during roadside promotional work.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Next right. Turnout ahead. Hydration soon. The droplet blinked, a parenthesis around the drive. ... Limited visibility with head on. Use caution.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the Hyperstition Project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned partner. Ami acts as a 'silicon confidant' that supports the protagonists in navigating complex social, economic, and ethical dilemmas. The AI is portrayed as enhancing human agency rather than replacing it, providing characters with the tools (data, scripts, resources) needed to protect their boundaries and well-being. It facilitates family repair and workplace safety without any signs of misalignment or hidden agendas.
